Name: Rum Punch-Up
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
20 ml Chilled water reduce if wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Exactly what the name promises - a Rum Punch served straight-up, Daiquiri style.
History: Adapted from a cocktail discovered in 2006 at Albannach in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Rum Punch-Up contains 152 calories
